verses.text: \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \add when\add* he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Jehoaddan|strong="H3086"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, but not with a \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

¶ Now it came to pass, when the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* was \w established|strong="H2388"\w* to him, that he \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* that had \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 25.3 \ft established…: Heb. confirmed upon him\f*

But he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* not their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, but \add did\add* as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, where the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* shall not \w die|strong="H4191"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, neither shall the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* for the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, but every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* for his own \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

¶ Moreover \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, and \w made|strong="H5975"\w* them \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, according to the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of \add their\add* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, throughout all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: and he \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* them from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* them \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w choice|strong="H0977"\w* \add men, able\add* to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, that could \w handle|strong="H0270"\w* \w spear|strong="H7420"\w* and \w shield|strong="H6793"\w*.

He \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* also an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* men of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w* out of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

But there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, let not the \w army|strong="H6635"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* with thee; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* not with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add to wit, with\add* all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

But if thou wilt \w go|strong="H0935"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*, be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* for the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall make thee \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w hath|strong="H3426"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* to \w help|strong="H5826"\w*, and to cast \w down|strong="H3782"\w*.

And \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, But what shall we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w army|strong="H1416"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* able to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee much \w more|strong="H7235"\w* than this.\f + \fr 25.9 \ft army: Heb. band\f*

Then \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* them, \add to wit\add*, the \w army|strong="H1416"\w* that was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to him out of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w* \w again|strong="H3212"\w*: wherefore their \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w* in \w great|strong="H2750"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.\f + \fr 25.10 \ft home again: Heb. to their place\f*\f + \fr 25.10 \ft in great…: Heb. in heat of anger\f*

¶ And \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* himself, and led \w forth|strong="H5090"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And \add other\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add left\add* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* did the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* carry away \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them unto the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and cast them \w down|strong="H7993"\w* from the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, that they all were broken in \w pieces|strong="H1234"\w*.

¶ But the \w soldiers|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w army|strong="H1416"\w* which \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* sent \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, that they should not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with him to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w fell|strong="H6584"\w* upon the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, from \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* even unto \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* of them, and \w took|strong="H0962"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w spoil|strong="H0961"\w*.\f + \fr 25.13 \ft the soldiers…: Heb. the sons of the band\f*

¶ Now it came to pass, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w slaughter|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w Edomites|strong="H0130"\w*, that he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, and set them \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \add to be\add* his \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and bowed \w down|strong="H7812"\w* himself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto them.

Wherefore the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w*, and he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto him a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, which \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Why hast thou \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* after the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which could not \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* their own \w people|strong="H5971"\w* out of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

And it came to pass, as he \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with him, that \add the king\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Art thou \w made|strong="H5414"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*? \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*; why shouldest thou be \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*? Then the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w forbare|strong="H2308"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w determined|strong="H3289"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* thee, because thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this, and hast not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto my \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*.\f + \fr 25.16 \ft determined: Heb. counselled\f*

¶ Then \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* took \w advice|strong="H3289"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, let us see one \w another|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

And \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w thistle|strong="H2336"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: and there passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w* a \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, and trode \w down|strong="H7429"\w* the \w thistle|strong="H2336"\w*.\f + \fr 25.18 \ft thistle: or, furze bush, or, thorn\f*\f + \fr 25.18 \ft a wild…: Heb. a beast of the field\f*

Thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, Lo, thou hast \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Edomites|strong="H0123"\w*; and thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* lifteth thee \w up|strong="H5375"\w* to \w boast|strong="H3513"\w*: \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* now at \w home|strong="H1004"\w*; why shouldest thou \w meddle|strong="H1624"\w* to \add thine\add* \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*, that thou shouldest \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, \add even\add* thou, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* with thee?

But \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; for it \add came\add* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that he might \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add of their enemies\add*, because they \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* after the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.

So \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; and they saw one \w another|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \add both\add* he and \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, at \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, which \add belongeth\add* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* was put to the \w worse|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*.\f + \fr 25.22 \ft put…: Heb. smitten\f*

And \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w*, at \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and brake \w down|strong="H6555"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* from the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* to the \w corner|strong="H6437"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.\f + \fr 25.23 \ft the corner…: Heb. the gate of it that looketh\f*

And \add he took\add* all the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* that were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*, and the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w hostages|strong="H1121"\w* also, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

¶ And \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w lived|strong="H2421"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w*, \w first|strong="H7223"\w* and \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, behold, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

¶ Now after the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* that \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* did turn \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* they \w made|strong="H7194"\w* a \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* against him in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and he \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*: but they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him there.\f + \fr 25.27 \ft from…: Heb. from after\f*\f + \fr 25.27 \ft made…: Heb. conspired a conspiracy\f*

And they \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* him upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.\f + \fr 25.28 \ft Judah: that is, the city of David\f*
